Located in the heart of the 6th district, within the Cité Internationale, this establishment is the ideal place to relax and enjoy all the wonders of Lyon, 10 minutes from the city centre and the Part-Dieu train station. When you enter, you are immediately greeted by a warm and modern decor. Whether you are here for business or pleasure,the Crowne Plaza Lyon hotel is the ideal place for you, the caring and dedicated team is here to meet all your needs.
The spacious and bright rooms offer you all the necessary comforts: safe, ironing board, selection of coffee and tea, as well as free Wifi and access to a Chromecast service. Personalize your stay and treat yourself to a room with a shower, bath or balcony. A preference for a high floor? it is also possible! Finally, connecting family rooms and suites will be an undeniable asset for the organization of your family trip or weekend.
The hotel is also known for the quality of its bedding, a good night’s sleep awaits you.
The restaurant - bar offers a friendly experience with its superb room, its central bar and its large terrace facing the park. Throughout the day, the Chef prepares a varied menu with Italian flavours: dishes to share, daily menu... you will be delighted! Enjoy a refreshing cocktail and antipasti and enjoy a relaxing moment.
If you are looking for something to do after a busy day, you can choose between a fitness centre, a walk along the Rhone River or a race in the park with its entrance facing the hotel.
Whether you’re here on business or for pleasure

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Novotel Annecy Centre Atria is located in central Annecy, a 5-minute walk from the old town, the lake and the Château d'Annecy. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including beIN Sports and Canal +. They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. They feature a seating area and the private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria offers a buffet breakfast. Various dining options including European and French dishes are available at The Craic, the in-house restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink and light snacks in the hotel bar.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria also has an indoor play area and a library for children. Bike rental is available.

Annecy TGV Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel and Lake Annecy is 1 km away. A private garage is available on site for an extra charge.

Le Bel Abri is a hotel set in a former family house. It is located a 1-minute walk from Annecy Lake and a 6-minute drive from the city centre of Annecy. A sun terrace and free WiFi are available.

All accessed by a staircase, the rooms include a flat-screen TV, floor heating, air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some rooms have a balcony and views of the lake or the mountains. There is a room on the ground floor adapted to people with reduced mobility.

The restaurant's cuisine is inspired by international flavours. A bar is also available on site.

The property is 46 km from Geneva International Airport. Free public parking is available.

hotel_name: Annecy cœur de ville - Appartement balcon
hotel_description:
Annecy cœur de ville - Appartement balcon is set in the Annecy City Centre district of Annecy, 41 km from Stade de Genève, 44 km from Jet d'Eau and 44 km from Gare de Cornavin. It is situated 36 km from Bourget Lake and features free WiFi plus a lift. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 35 km from Rochexpo.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

St. Pierre Cathedral is 45 km from the apartment, while United Nations Geneva is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from Annecy cœur de ville - Appartement balcon.

This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle. It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar. Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral. The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at Le Pélican.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from the accommodation, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from Le Pélican.

hotel_address: 16, rue du Champ de la Taillee, 74600 Annecy, France
hotel_description:
Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy offers accommodation in Seynod, 2 km from central Annecy and 3 km from Lake Annecy. The studios and apartments in Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy have a contemporary décor and offers a reception working hours between 6.15 am - 9.00 pm . Free WiFi is provided in all rooms.

The apartments feature a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower or bathtub. Provided with bath towels and bed linen, each apartment has self-catering facilities and is cleaned weekly.

Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences Les Hauts d'Annecy is a 45-minute drive to La Clusaz and Grand Bornand ski resorts. Guests can also explore Annecy Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Palais de l’Isle.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

Featuring a fitness centre, Best Western Hôtel International is situated at the entrance of Annecy, 2 km from Annecy Lake and city centre. It offers a 24-hour front desk service, an onsite restaurant and a bar. It is 500 metres from the train station and a 4-minute drive to motorway A41.

Each soundproofed room at the Best Western Hôtel International is air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in the hotel dining room.

Guests can explore the town, which is only a few minutes' walk from the Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Château d'Annecy.

Featuring a fitness centre and a wellness area with sauna and steam room,

GChevêne car park is available 200 metres from the hotel and indoor car park of 9 places is available upon reservation.

Set in Annecy, Le Claudius is a sustainable accommodation, 35 km from Rochexpo and 36 km from Bourget Lake. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is located 41 km from Stade de Genève.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Jet d'Eau is 45 km from Le Claudius, while Gare de Cornavin is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Situated 200 metres from the shores of Lake Annecy, Atipik Hôtel is at the entrance of the medieval old town and pedestrian shopping streets. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen TV with international and TNT channels is provided in all rooms. Each has a private bathroom with a shower.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 250 metres from Atipik Hôte.

Located in Annecy Le Vieux in the French Alps, Hôtel Les Muses is composed of 2 buildings with rooms that overlook Lake Annecy or Mont Veyrier.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing. The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site. Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

hotel_address: 12 Rue De La Poste, 74000 Annecy, France
hotel_description:
The Hôtel des Alpes offers 2-star accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lake Annecy and 100 meters away from the train station. The old city, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes. Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 48 km from the property. Public parking is available nearby. It is free from 19:00 to 08:00 and at extra charge during the rest of the day.

hotel_name: Best Western Plus Hotel Carlton Annecy
hotel_description:
Best Western Carlton Annecy is located in central Annecy at the medieval town's gates. Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk away.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. Every room has a private bathroom while some rooms offer a mountain view.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar during the evenings. The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be served in the comfort of your room or in the dining room.

A private garage is available upon prior reservation and for an additional fee. The Best Western Carlton Annecy is situated 200 metres from the train station, bus stop and taxi rank.

hotel_name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy
hotel_address: 138 rue des paquerettes Cran Gevrier, 74960 Annecy, France
hotel_description:
Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy is located just 3.5 km from Annecy Lake and a 4-minute drive from Annecy city centre. It offers rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily. The restaurant serves traditional French dishes and offers a terrace.

There is also a bar and lounge area with a pool table, a pinball machine and table football, and a playground for children. Ironing facilities and a selection of board games are available at the reception upon request.

Guests can enjoy private access for 1 or 2 people to the sensory relaxation area upon reservation and at an additional cost. The space includes a balneo hot tub with massage jets and light therapy, a sauna, a video wall and a starry sky.

The region has many activities to offer, such as paragliding and rock-climbing. Free private parking is available on site.

Situated 36 km from Bourget Lake, 41 km from Stade de Genève and 44 km from Jet d'Eau, Cosy studio provides accommodation set in Annecy. The property is around 44 km from Gare de Cornavin, 44 km from St. Pierre Cathedral and 46 km from United Nations Geneva. The property is non-smoking and is located 35 km from Rochexpo.

The apartment features a balcony, 1 bedroom, a living room and a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

PalExpo is 46 km from the apartment, while CERN is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from Cosy studio.

Featuring a bar, AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg is set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, 200 metres from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre and 700 metres from European Parliament. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km away and Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 3.6 km from the hotel.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and gluten-free options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

St. Paul's Church is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 13 km from AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg.

hotel_name: Le Saint-Florent - Proche hyper-centre, CHU et Gare
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Le Saint-Florent - Proche hyper-centre, CHU et Gare is located in Strasbourg, 4.3 km from Zénith de Strasbourg, 4.5 km from Strasbourg Cathedral, and 4.5 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. The property is situated 4.6 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, 5 km from European Parliament and 5.1 km from Strasbourg History Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and St. Paul's Church is 4 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 8.1 km from the apartment, while The Robertsau Forest is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 14 km from Le Saint-Florent - Proche hyper-centre, CHU et Gare.

hotel_address: 8 Boulevard du Semnoz  - Zone d'activités  de Periaz Seynod, 74600 Annecy, France
hotel_description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, Ace Hotel Annecy is located in Seynod. Free WiFi access is available in public areas and the rooms. The property is within 5 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy’s city centre.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and satellite channels. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a wardrobe.

At Ace Hotel Annecy you will find vending machines and a dining room where a breakfast is served each morning. The hotel is in a shopping area and a variety of restaurants can be found within 300 metres.

Facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling. Lac d’Annecy Golf Course is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

Free parking is available on site. Annecy Train Station is 3.4 km away. Public transit to the city centre of Annecy is just 100 metres away, and operates Mon-Sat.

hotel_name: Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf
hotel_address: 8 Rue Du Rond Point - Cran Gévrier, 74960 Annecy, France
hotel_description:
The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located 3 km from Lake Annecy and 1 km from Annecy’s historic centre. It provides access to La Clusaz and Grand-Bornand ski resorts, 45 minutes away by car.

Ideal for both short-term and longer stays, these comfortable apartments include free WiFi and modern amenities. A buffet breakfast is available from Monday to Friday at an additional cost.

The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located in Cran Gevrier and is near to shops, restaurants and local transport services.

Annecy Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and parking is available for an additional charge. Semnoz Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive away.

Set in Strasbourg, K Hotel features a fitness centre and views of the city. The property is located 3.9 km from St. Paul's Church, 4 km from The 'Petite France' and 4.3 km from Exposition Park, Strasbourg. All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. With a private shower room, rooms at K HOTEL also boast free WiFi. The units at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk.

K Hotel offers a terrace.

Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Strasbourg Cathedral is 4.4 km from the hotel. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km from the property. Espace Européen de l’Entreprise is less than a 10-minute drive.

Conveniently located in the centre of Strasbourg, Appart'City Strasbourg is a 10-minute walk from the train station. This Green Key-awarded property offers self-catering studios with a view of the city. Fiber optic internet access is provided.

Decorated in a contemporary style, the apartments feature a flat-screen TV, individual heating and en suite facilities with a shower. The kitchenette includes a dishwasher, kitchenware and a refrigerator.

A buffet breakfast is available daily upon request. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

Luggage storage is possible for an extra cost per suitcase.

Strasbourg International Airport is 17 km from Appart'City Strasbourg and private on-site parking is available with prior reservation at an extra cost.

Situated in Strasbourg and with Strasbourg Exhibition Centre reachable within 200 metres, Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is located 800 metres from European Parliament, 1.8 km from St. Paul's Church and 2.3 km from Strasbourg Cathedral. Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km away and Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 3.6 km from the hotel.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and gluten-free options.

Staff speak German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk.

Strasbourg History Museum is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while The Robertsau Forest is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 13 km from Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg.

hotel_name: L'Abreuvoir - Mignon petit studio au coeur de la Krutenau
hotel_description:
Located in Strasbourg, less than 1 km from Strasbourg History Museum and a 9-minute walk from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg, L'Abreuvoir - Mignon petit studio au coeur de la Krutenau offers air conditioning. The property is around 1.1 km from Strasbourg Cathedral, 2.8 km from European Parliament and 3.5 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and St. Paul's Church is 1 km away.

The apartment comes with a TV. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Zénith de Strasbourg is 7.7 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 11 km from L'Abreuvoir - Mignon petit studio au coeur de la Krutenau.

hotel_address: 5C Boulevard du Président Wilson, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
Located a 5-minute walk from Strasbourg Train Station, Lagrange Apart’Hotel Strasbourg Wilson offers free access to an indoor heated swimming pool. Place des Halles Shopping Centre is only 270 metres away and La Petite France district is a 15-minute walk from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All apartments and studios are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, seating area and bathroom with bathtub. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, dishwasher and microwave.

A breakfast is available each morning at Lagrange Apart’Hotel Strasbourg Wilson and is served in the breakfast room. Grocery shops and restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the property.

A hammam and sauna are also available at an extra charge. Luggage storage is available for free at the property.

hotel_address: 12, Place de la Gare, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
Located opposite Strasbourg train station, the Grand Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from the city centre and Place Kléber. It offers a bar, terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

All of the rooms are set in modern decor and feature en suite facilities. Each features a flat-screen satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access. The rooms are serviced by a lift.

The buffet breakfast is served daily and is composed of sweet and savoury dishes. It can be sampled on the terrace when the weather is fine. Guests can order room service 24 hours a day. The lounge bar is ideal for relaxing after a day of sightseeing or business.

Located 15 km from the airport and 8 km from Germany’s borders, Le Grand Hotel is ideally located to visit the surrounding area. Guests may choose to visit the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette or Strasbourg Cathedral.

Hôtel Patricia - Strasbourg Hyper Centre is located in the heart of Strasbourg’s picturesque centre, a short walk from the Cathedral, in the Petite France district. It offers affordable accommodation in an historic building.

Guest rooms at the Patricia are functional. Double, twin, triple and Quadruple rooms are available depending on your needs. Some have their own en suite bathroom. There is also a cheaper, budget option with shared facilities.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the nearby Café, located 100 metres from the property.

The Hotel Patricia is in quiet surroundings, and is 100% non-smoking. It also offers Wi-Fi and a daily continental breakfast.

Set 600 metres from St. Paul's Church, 1.1 km from Strasbourg Cathedral and 1.3 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg, TRES BEL APPARTEMENT offers accommodation situated in Strasbourg. The property is located 4.7 km from Park of the Chateau de Pourtales, 7.1 km from Zénith de Strasbourg and 7.7 km from The Robertsau Forest. Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 20 km from the apartment.

The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, European Parliament and Strasbourg History Museum. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from TRES BEL APPARTEMENT.

Located in Strasbourg, this hotel is just 600 metres from the Palace of the Rhine and a 15-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral. It has a 24-hour reception and features a games area with billiard, air hockey and foosball.

Guest rooms have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private bathroom and is non-smoking. All rooms are serviced by a lift and some of them feature a balcony. A baby kit including a baby cot, a baby bath and a bottle warmer can be provided.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. The restaurant at Ciarus Hostel offers meals prepared with local products for lunch and dinner and guests can enjoy a drink in one of the property's 2 bars. Vending machines are available at reception. Children's facilities such as baby changing area, children's meals and children's high chair.

Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property.

Strasbourg Train Station is 1.5 km away. Strasbourg Entzheim Airport is 18 km away. Private parking is possible on site, upon reservation and at a surcharge.

hotel_address: 7 Rue de la Krutenau, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
The People - Strasbourg features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Strasbourg. The property is around 800 metres from Strasbourg Cathedral, 2.4 km from European Parliament and 3.1 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and free WiFi throughout the property.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the hostel.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The People - Strasbourg include St. Paul's Church, Strasbourg History Museum and Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

hotel_name: Halles de Strasbourg - Bel appt proche de la gare
hotel_description:
Set in Strasbourg, 1.7 km from St. Paul's Church and 1.3 km from Strasbourg Cathedral, Halles de Strasbourg - Bel appt avec parking offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 2.5 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, 2.7 km from European Parliament and 1.4 km from Strasbourg History Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.3 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 5.8 km from the apartment, while Zénith de Strasbourg is 6.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 11 km from Halles de Strasbourg - Bel appt avec parking.

hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
This residence offers comfortable, self catering accommodation. It is in a quiet road in the city centre, a 5-minute walk from the historic Petite France district and Strasbourg Cathedral.

The studios at the Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber are equipped with free wired Internet and accessible by lift. They also have a flat-screen TV, work desk and a private bathroom. All studios have a fully equipped kitchenette.

Séjours & Affaires Strasbourg Kleber is accessible by car and a public car park is just 2 minutes away. It is well-linked by the tram to the rest of the city and just a 10-minute walk to the train station.

City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is located 1 km from Strasbourg Train Station and 1.5 km from La Petite France district in Strasbourg city. It offers 24-hour reception and self-catering accommodation with soundproofing. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The spacious suites have a flat-screen TV, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette. Each accommodation has a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at City Résidence Strasbourg Centre can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet in the dining hall.

The City Résidence Strasbourg Centre is a 20-minute walk from Strasbourg Cathedral and 2 km from the Strasbourg Exhibition Centre.

hotel_address: 50-54 Rue Du Jeu Des Enfants, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
Located next to Place Kléber, this Citadines Apart'hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Strasbourg SNCF Train Station. It offers fully-furnished apartments serviced by an elevator and equipped with free Wi-Fi access.

Apartments at the Citadines Apart'hotel Strasbourg Kléber feature a flat-screen TV, DVD player and desk in the seating area. They each have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher and linen and towels are provided.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room.

Private parking is available on site at an additional cost. The hotel also has a launderette and offers a dry-cleaning service.

Strasbourg Cathedral and the Petite France area of the city are a 5-minute walk from the aparthotel. The Alsace Museum is 750 metres away.

hotel_name: Le Tribunal - Studio près de l’avenue des Vosges
hotel_address: 5 Rue Jacques Kablé La Canopée, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
Le Tribunal - Studio près de l’avenue des Vosges is situated in the Quartier Européen - Orangerie district of Strasbourg, 1.5 km from Strasbourg Cathedral, 2.3 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg and 1.9 km from European Parliament. It is located 1.9 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from St. Paul's Church.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Strasbourg History Museum is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 5.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from Le Tribunal - Studio près de l’avenue des Vosges.

hotel_address: 24 rue du Faubourg National, 67000 Strasbourg, France
hotel_description:
ClapClap Hotel is a hotel located 400 metres from Strasbourg TGV Train station and Tram Station. It is 600 metres from the city centre and offers a terrace and rooms with free WiFi access.

Rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and fully equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite includes a shower and a hairdryer. Rooms are serviced by an elevator.

Breakfast is served as a buffet every morning. You can also read the morning newspapers at ClapClap Hotel.

ClapClap Hotel is a 5-minute walk to the Petite France district with its tourist sites, pedestrian streets, shops and restaurants. The Strasbourg Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art is 6 minutes’ walk away.

We would like to limit the number of reservations for groups. Indeed, a different cancellation policy applies for more than 5 rooms booked.

hotel_name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Strasbourg Petite France
hotel_description:
Located in the city centre, this Aparthotel with a 24-hour reception is just 1.5 km from Strasbourg Cathedral.  Free WiFi access and a fully equipped kitchen are in the modern studios and apartments.

A flat-screen TV and a telephone are included in all of the accommodations. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A microwave, fridge and coffee maker are provided in the kitchens. You can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room at the Aparthotel Adagio Access Strasbourg Petite France.

Strasbourg Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art is 350 metres from this residence and the train station is a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is possible on site,  at an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

hotel_name: Dragon RDC - Superbe appt près de la Petite France

Zénith de Strasbourg is 6.3 km from the apartment, while The Robertsau Forest is 9.2 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 10 km from Dragon RDC - Superbe appt près de la Petite France.

Set in Strasbourg in the Alsace region, with St. Paul's Church and Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg nearby, Appart de l'ill offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is situated 1.1 km from Strasbourg Cathedral, 2.5 km from European Parliament and 3.2 km from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Strasbourg History Museum.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured.

Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 4.9 km from the apartment, while The Robertsau Forest is 7.8 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 12 km from Appart de l'ill.

hotel_name: Magda & Lena Strasbourg city center Bail Mobilité
hotel_description:
Conveniently set in the Bourse-Esplanade district of Strasbourg, Magda & Lena Strasbourg city center Bail Mobilité is located 400 metres from Strasbourg History Museum, 1.1 km from St. Paul's Church and 1.4 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. All rooms feature a kitchen and a private bathroom. Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 3.6 km from the apartment and Park of the Chateau de Pourtales is 5.2 km away.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Strasbourg, like cycling.

hotel_address: 2 place Charles de Gaulle, 68920 Eguisheim, France
hotel_description:
Located in the typical Alsatian village of Eguisheim, this hotel is set in a half-timbered building and offers an on-site restaurant serving traditional regional cuisine.

Guest rooms are simply decorated and equipped with a flat-screen TV. They each offer a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and either a bathtub or shower. Some rooms provide a seating area.

James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is located among the vineyards of Eguisheim. It offers a spectacular view of the Black Forest.

The establishment is equipped with two pools, one outdoor heated to 29°C (Closed in winter, open according to weather conditions and seasons). Our relaxing area is open and has one indoor swimming pool which is heated to 29°C, it also has a Jacuzzi and a panoramic sauna at an extra cost. Bath robes, towels and flip flops are proposed to our guests at the Front Desk, with a supplementary price.

There are 31 furnished rooms with a private bathroom. Each room at the James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is equipped with a TV, telephone, air-conditioning and minibar.

A breakfast buffet with sweet and savoury options is available daily. Breakfast must be reserved upon arrival. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Parking is in extra at 8€ per day on site. You will find a choice of restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 500 meters away.

The wellness area is open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. This private space has an additional cost of €11 for ages 13 and over and €4 for ages 7 to 12. To make this moment relaxing, we provide you with bathrobes, towels and flip-flops.

A fitness centre, a sauna and a sensory shower are available at Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden.

Colmar TGV train station is situated 2km from the hotel. The Alsace wineries and picturesque villages are in the surrounding areas from the Mercure.  A private covered parking accessible by an elevator.

hotel_address: 26 Rue des Métiers (GPS : 1 Rue des Frères Lumière, GPS : 48,113 / 7,365), 68000 Colmar, France
hotel_description:
Hôtel Roi Soleil Prestige is located on the outskirts of Colmar, 4.7 km from the city centre and Unterlinden Museum. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and a luggage storage is at guests' disposal. Colmar Christmas Market - Place Jeanne d'Arc is 4.6 km away.

Each room features a unique Fresco painting and has a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms are also air-conditioned and feature a laptop safe box. They are all serviced by an elevator.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining area. The hotel offers a jazz-themed lounge bar where guests can relax with a drink and vending machines serving drinks and snacks are also available.

Hôtel Roi Soleil Prestige is located 1.3 km from Colmar Exhibition Centre. A secure bike shed is available upon request and a free parking is available.

Hotel Hotel Le Colombier is located in the Little Venice district of Colmar town centre. The Musée d'Histoire Naturelle of Colmar is 50 meters away and Unterlinden Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Free WiFi access is provided.

All rooms and suites have air conditioning, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathrooms come with a shower, free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, and the Colombier Hotel provides a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the bar or in the garden.

Colmar Train Station is 1 km from Hotel Le Colombier. The nearest airport is Strasbourg Airport, 72 km away.

hotel_address: 15 route de Neuf Brisach - Horbourg Wihr, 68180 Colmar, France
hotel_description:
The restaurant "Le Comptoir d'Henri" offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh produce from the market. The restaurant is serving a buffet from seasonal and traditional products. It is open from Tuesday to Saturday included, from 6:45pm to 9:30pm.
During the Christmas markets, our restaurant will be open everyday of the week, from 6:45pm to 9:30pm (from the  24/12/2023 to 23/12/2023 included).

For your information, our restaurant Le Comptoir d'Henri will be fully closed from the 07/01/2024 to the 11/03/2024 included, we will re-open our restaurant for dinner on the 12/03/2024.

There is also a bar "L'Eclipse" which is open from 4pm to midnight.

Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine. Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property. Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

hotel_address: 7 place de La Gare, 68000 Colmar, France
hotel_description:
Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station. It offers a fitness and spa centre with sauna, hammam and massage treatments. The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines. A buffet breakfast is prepared daily. Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation. Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.

hotel_name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
hotel_address: 13, Route De Neuf-Brisach - Horbourg Wihr, 68180 Colmar, France
hotel_description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim. Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub. The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

Hotel Primo Colmar Centre is located at the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Unterlinden Museum and the Christmas market, and 5 minutes' drive from Colmar Expo and the Bartholdi's Statue of Liberty. It offers free WiFi access.

The contemporary rooms feature a private bathroom and a TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

Public parking is available in front of the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre at an extra cost. It is just 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station. You can also travel the 15-minute drive to the famous vineyards on the Alsace Wine Route.

The accommodation features a seating area, flat-screen TV, wardrobe and private bathroom with a bath or shower. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and refrigerator.

A breakfast is available each morning at Odalys City Colmar La Rose d'Argent and children can enjoy it at a reduced cost.  Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the accommodation.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and private parking is available upon prior reservation. Colmar Expo Centre is 3.3 km away and Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is located 54 km from the accommodation.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:

Each accommodation is decorated in a contemporary style and features a seating area and TV. Most offer a balcony or terrace, upon availability. The kitchen is equipped with an oven or microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator.

hotel_address: 2 Rue De La Fecht, 68000 Colmar, France

On-site parking is free of charge subject to availability and the Colmar Train Station is 2 km away. Strasbourg is a 1-hour drive away and the Colmar Airport is 3 km from the hotel.

hotel_name: The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare (P'tit Dej-Hotel)

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare is situated between the town centre of Colmar and the railway station in the beautiful Alsace region of France.

All guest rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and equipped with standard amenities including telephone and a TV with satellite channels. Swiss and German TV channels are also available.

The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare also has a pleasant dining area where a delicious breakfast is served. Also, there is a 24-hour reception hosted by a multilingual staff (French, English and German).

In the surrounding area guests can enjoy the many alpine ski trails and the beauty of Vosges that are located less than an hour from the hotel.

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of  Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

Hotel Turenne is located at the entrance to Colmar’s old quarter, 750 metres from the Saint Martin Church. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning, and there are many typical Alsatian restaurants in the surrounding area. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Hotel Turenne’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Private parking for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is also available at an extra cost and is subject to availability (reservation is needed).

The hotel is close to the famous Unterlinden and Bartholdi museums and the town’s pedestrian and commercial districts. Gare de Colmar Train station is 1.3 km away, the German border is 20 km from the Hotel Turenne.

hotel_address: 1B rue des Frères Lumière, 68000 Colmar, France

Each soundproofed room at the B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière offers modern facilities including cable on a flat-screen TV. It also has private bathroom.

Soleil Colmar features a garden that guests can enjoy.

Free parking is provided at the Hôtel Roi Soleil, making it easy to explore Colmar and the surrounding Alsatian vineyards by car.

Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

The area is popular for skiing and hiking, and car hire is available at this 5-star apartment. Bike tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include House of the Heads, Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and Colmar Train Station. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg, 55 km from Suites Residences Spa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The property has quiet street views and is 600 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 3.2 km from Dijon Congrexpo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Saint-Philibert Church is less than 1 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Dijon, like hiking.

Chenove Centre Tramway Station is 4.3 km from Au jardin des plantes, while Universite Tramway Station is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

hotel_address: 22 Boulevard De La Marne, 21071 Dijon, France
hotel_description:
Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau is a 4-star non-smoking hotel in the city centre of Dijon, opposite the Auditorium and the Convention Centre.

Guestrooms are spacious and practical and equipped with modern en suite facilities, air-conditioning and satellite TV.

Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau offers a restaurant, Le Château Bourgogne, serving traditional and regional gourmet cuisine for lunch and dinner. In the summer months, guests can dine on the peaceful poolside terrace.

The hotel offers secure parking on site.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Featuring a bar and views of inner courtyard, Appart Hotel Montchapet Dijon Centre is a sustainable aparthotel set in Dijon, 700 metres from Dijon Train Station. It is located 700 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and offers full-day security. This 2-star aparthotel offers private entrance.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a desk. With a private bathroom, units at the aparthotel also provide guests with free WiFi. At the aparthotel, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast. If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchenette facilities, which include a fridge, kettle and a stovetop.

For guests with children, the aparthotel provides a baby safety gate.

Saint-Philibert Church is less than 1 km from Appart Hotel Montchapet Dijon Centre, while Dijon Congrexpo is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

hotel_address: 8 rue du Docteur Maret, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_description:
Featuring a bar, Mama Shelter Dijon is located in Dijon in the Burgundy region, 200 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 700 metres from Dijon Train Station. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides karaoke and a 24-hour front desk.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units in Mama Shelter Dijon are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving French and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 600 metres from Mama Shelter Dijon, while Dijon Congrexpo is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

Located opposite Dijon Train Station, the ibis Dijon Gare Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the historic city centre. It offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a radio and free WiFi.

The ibis Dijon Gare's restaurant, Le Klub, serves regional cuisine and a large wine selection. During the summer, guests can enjoy their meal on the floral terrace.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

hotel_name: Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs
hotel_address: 18 rue Sainte Anne, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne.

Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
The Hôtel Montchapet is located in the heart of Dijon, just a 10-minute walk to Gare de Dijon-Ville. It offers soundproofed accommodation and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Montchapet Hotel has a modern decor and a private bathroom.

Guests at the Montchapet can relax with a drink in the bar after a day of sightseeing. The hotel is less than a 10-minute walk from the Dijon Cathedral.

Featuring free WiFi, The Hotel Thurot is conveniently located 300 metres from Dijon city centre and the train station.

This 2-star hotel offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms fully equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and a bar invites guests to relax with a drink at the end of the day. During summer, the staff can organise visits to a nearby wine cellar, where you will enjoy a wine-tasting session at an extra cost.

Hotel Thurot is close to shops and restaurants, and is just a short walk from Dijon Musée des Beux Arts and the city hall. Secure parking is available onsite, subject to availability as there are limited spaces.

Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Dijon Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

With a simple decor, the soundproofed rooms at Hôtel Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or include a private bathroom and an LCD TV with Canal+. Provided with free WiFi, rooms are all accessible by lift and some are suitable for families or groups of friends.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Guests can have a drink at the hotel’s bar and eat at the restaurant, which proposes à la carte menus including Burgundian specialties, grills, salads and pizzas.

Dijon’s Train Station is 6 km away and Dijon-Bourgogne Airport is 20 minutes by car. The Palais des Sports is a 9-minute drive and the Musée des Beaux-Arts is 5 km away.

Dijon Congrexpo is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Zénith de Dijon is 5 km away. Dole - Jura Airport is 43 km from the property.

hotel_address: 7-9 Rue Docteur Albert Remy, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_description:
The Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare is 120 metres from Dijon Train Station and offers an indoor swimming pool and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned bedroom has a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV. All the rooms have a private bathroom.

Extras include a fitness centre and a sauna upon reservation.

The hotel reception is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. There are 2 TV lounges on the ground floor and a computer with internet access is available for guests' use.

The hotel has a bar and large groups can be catered for on request, 24 hours a day. A hot buffet breakfast is available daily.

The hotel is 7 km from Dijon Bourgogne Airport. A close garage parking is available at an additional cost. The Palais des Congrès is a 7-minute tram ride away and both the university campus and the Toison d'Or shopping centre are less than 20 minutes from the property.

Located in the centre of Dijon, just a 3-minute walk from the Place de la République, Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République offers a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access throughout. The Fine Arts Museum is a 15-minute walk away.

All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a living area with a TV, a desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The fully equipped kitchen includes a microwave, stovetop and refrigerator.

You can prepare homemade meals in the studio or apartment. A buffet breakfast is also served each morning in the property's breakfast room and children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. Guests can also find grocery shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Classed as an eco-friendly building due to its photovoltaic roof, the aparthotel is easily accessible by public transport. The tramway and L3 bus provide direct access to Dijon Train Station, which is 500 metres from Dijon Congrexpo Exhibition Centre. Private parking is available on site at a surcharge.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Dijon, an IHG Hotel

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a walk-in shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

There is also an electric kettle in every room.  A buffet breakfast is available daily and vending machines with snacks are provided on site.

The hotel is situated 3 km from Dijon centre and 4.6 km from the train station.  The property offers free, secured parking.

hotel_address: 14 Avenue Foch, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France

Most of the spacious guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and are soundproofed.

The Hôtel Le Jura serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest rooms. You can also enjoy a drink from the bar and there are vending machines available.

Guests can enjoy an indoor heated swimming pool, a hammam and a fitness room.

hotel_address: 5, rue Lamonnoye, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel

With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

At the hotel, each room has a desk. Guest rooms at Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.

Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel offers a sauna.

Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Dijon - Bourgogne Airport Tramway Station is 5.4 km from the hotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel.

hotel_address: 3/5, rue Turgot, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France

All of the accommodations at Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers have a private shower room with free toiletries and hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access and a cable TV are also available.

The apartments have an equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and an electric kettle. Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The property is 500 metres from the Palais des Ducs and Fines Arts Museum, and 1.50 km from Dijon ville train station. Dijon Congrexpo is 1.5 km away.

hotel_address: 3 rue du Nord, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
This 18th-century coaching hotel is located in a peaceful street in the historical centre of Dijon. It offers a modern and elegant setting and free Wi-Fi access.

Hotel République features rooms decorated with warm colours to offer a cosy atmosphere. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Guests can relax on the terrace at the République Hotel. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

hotel_address: 96 rue des Godrans, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
hotel_description:
Ideally located in the heart of the pedestrian quarter, close to the Palais des Ducs.

Formerly known as the Au Pauvre Diable shop, the building houses 53 nicely furnished apartments ranging from single to quadruple. Every apartment is equipped with air-conditioning, a full kitchenette with hot hobs, fridge and microwave, a safe and a television.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels. The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water. Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

L'emplacement idéal pour vos déplacements professionnels ou pour une visite de notre belle région.

Nous mettons à votre disposition différents types de chambres aménagées et décorées avec soin dans le respect de nos valeurs éco-responsables.

hotel_address: 4, avenue Jean Guiton, 17000 La Rochelle, France
hotel_description:
The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

hotel_address: 3 Rue De La Monnaie, 17000 La Rochelle, France
hotel_description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

The rooms at the Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne include an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. They are decorated in neutral shades and feature stylish wooden furnishings.

Some rooms feature a private bathroom while other have access to a shared bathroom and toilet.

You can reach the attractions of Bayonne on foot thanks to the central location of the Hôtel des Arceaux.

The hotel is ideal for exploring the Basque country. Explore the mountains, beaches and countryside in the area surrounding the Hôtel des Arceaux.

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture

Traditional cuisine is proposed in the restaurant at Hôtel Le Bayonne, and drinks are served in the bar. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Villa la Renaissance have a balcony. All guest rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:

The rooms at ibis Bayonne have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower.

Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Renovated in May 2020, rooms at the Hotel Loreak are also air-conditioned and come with a work desk. There is a hairdryer in the private bathroom and all rooms are serviced by a lift.

The restaurant offers regional cuisine with a buffet service, and set menus are also available. Guest can also relax with a drink in the lounge.

Free on-site parking is available at the Hotel Loreak and the beaches of Biarritz and Anglet are just 8 km away. The hotel is serviced by the A63 motorway.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Just 5 minutes walking distance from the Biarritz beaches, sits Hotel Edouard VII, a 19th-century residence that combines the charm of yesterday and the comfort of today.

This unique residence has a rich history based on its past residents. It was once the home of the Mayor of Biarritz. It was also the place Napoleon III used to receive medical care on his visits to the region.

Guestrooms are spacious and feature a refined and elegant décor. All are air-conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with private bathrooms, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet access.

The area surrounding Hotel Edouard VII has much to offer. In addition to the beautiful coast and its beaches, you will find restaurants, shops, museums and casinos. San Sebastien is only a 45-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre

Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site.

A public car park is available 50 metres from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Centre.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only

Serviced by a lift, Carlina Lodge rooms have TV with cable channels and a terrace. They all offer a private bathroom with a bath tub and free toiletries.

There, breakfast can be enjoyed in the comfort of the room. Within a 5-minute walk, guests will find restaurants and bars.

All rooms are equipped with en suite Italian ceramic bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite and Canal+ channels and free Wi-Fi.

Guests can sample refined cuisine in Hôtel Le Café de Paris’ restaurant, which hasa menu elaborated by the Michelin-starred chef Cédric Béchade. The restaurant offers an outdoor terrace overlooking the Place Bellevue and the sea.

Situated in the seaside town of Biarritz, the Grand Tonic Hotel & SPA Biarritz is only 200 metres from the Grand Plage for a perfect stay on foot.

The hotel offers a shaded terrace and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Our air-conditioned rooms are almost all equipped with a hot tub in the bathroom. Each floor at the Grand Tonic Hotel is individually themed and equipped with international cabled television.

The LMB Restaurant serves fine cuisine where the guests can enjoy a coctail at the bar. Also, an all-you-can-eat continental buffet breakfast is served every morning.

For a perfect stay, you can relax in the heated indoor swimming pool, the hammam or the sauna of the SPA of the hotel. You will also find a treatment brochure (to book in advance) for your moment of relaxation.

Private paid parking is available for our guests with prior booking. Also, there is a public parking Biarritz Barrière Casino which is just 300 meters away.

Biarritz-Le Phare Golf Course is 1 km away.

This is our travelers' favorite part of Biarritz, according to independent reviews.
Couples particularly appreciate the location of this establishment. They give it a score of 9.2 for a stay for two.
