Situated in the Rhône delta, this hotel is just 700 metres from a fortified church dating from the Middle Ages. The local area also offers water sports such as windsurfing. Le Dauphin Bleu is 56.1km from Montpelier Airport.

hotel_address: 94 Chemin Bas de Dromar, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_description:
La Tramontane welcomes you in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, in the heart of the Camargues area. It offers individually-decorated rooms leading to the outdoor swimming pool, the garden and the private pond.

Soundproofed and air-conditioned, the guest rooms all feature a television and Wi-Fi access. They are decorated in a typical Provencal style and feature a private terrace overlooking the garden and the swimming pool.

We will have the pleasure to serve you on your terrace, at sunset, an aperitif accompanied by tapas to satisfy your gluttony or your appetite.  You can enjoy musical shows, such as the themed evening every Saturday night.

Free private secured parking is available on site.

hotel_address: Route D' Arles D570, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, L'auberge Camarguaise is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. The property was renovated in March 2016 and offers free private parking and free WiFi throughout.

Every room includes A double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property and bicycle hire is available.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling.

The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 50 km from L'auberge Camarguaise.

hotel_name: Mas de la Fouque - Hôtel & Spa
hotel_address: Route du Petit Rhône, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Mas de la Fouque boutique-hotel is located at the heart of the Camargue Nature Reserve just 10 minutes' drive from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2 km from the beaches. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site bar.

Each air-conditioned room and suite is uniquely decorated. Some have a private terrace facing the lagoons or swimming pool.  They are equipped with satellite TV. Free WiFi internet access in available throughout the property.

Guests can view local wild life such as flamingos, Camargue horses and wild bulls whilst enjoying a drink on the outdoor lounges. The on-site Nuxe spa proposes a sauna, outdoor relaxing bath and an indoor pool

The restaurant serves organic, natural cuisine and guests can dine al fresco or by the fireplace in winter. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Free private parking is available on site. Nimes Train Station is 40 minutes from Mas de la Fouque and Montpellier-Mediterranee Airport is 35 km away.

hotel_address: 1 17 Rue des Pénitents Blancs, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_description:
Appartement des Penitents is set in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 300 metres from Arenas Beach, 700 metres from Crin Blanc Beach, and 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amphora Beach is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from the apartment.

hotel_name: Apartment Le Soleil Camarguais - SMM153 by Interhome
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Set in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, near Arenas Beach and Crin Blanc Beach, Apartment Le Soleil Camarguais - SMM153 by Interhome is a sustainable apartment that offers guests with greener choices throughout their stay. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amphora Beach is 800 metres away.

The apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from Apartment Le Soleil Camarguais - SMM153 by Interhome.

hotel_address: Avenue du Dr Cambon, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_description:
Thalacap Camargue faces the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. You will enjoy a seasonal outdoor seawater swimming pool as well as an indoor swimming pool, sauna and hammam all year round at no additional cost

All of the rooms at Thalacap Camargue have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access and air conditioning.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean-style meals. Weather permitting, meals can be enjoyed on the terrace with a panoramic view of the sea.

In addition to the other relaxation facilities, guests have direct access to a Thalassotherapy centre, which provides a number of health and beauty treatments for an additional charge.

Arles is 37 km away. private parking is available on site for 10€/night.

Set in the Camargue Regional Park, Abrivado is an air-conditioned hotel located beside the harbour in the town of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It is 50 metres from the beach and the surrounding shops. Free WiFi access is provided in the guest rooms.

A TV is included in the rooms, which feature a simple décor. 12 of the rooms offer a sea view and 6 of them also feature a private furnished terrace. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is offered every morning at the hotel Abrivado for an extra charge.

Low-cost public parking is available nearby, and you can visit Arles, located 40 km away. Montpellier Airport is 52 km from the hotel. Public parking is available nearby.

hotel_address: Chemin du Pont Blanc, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
Set in Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer, Hôtel du Pont Blanc sits in a flowery garden with terrace and swimming pool, just an 8-minute walk from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided.

The hotel’s rooms feature a terrace with garden views and a flat-screen TV. They all have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and bathtub.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel at an extra cost. Throughout the day, you can find your little quiet corner in our garden. A little reading break? A little nap in the shade of our pines? Let yourself be tempted. A range of restaurants are to be found a 5-minute walk away.

Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer city centre is just a 5-minute walk away. Guests can drive 25 km to Aigues-Mortes or 34 km to Le-Grau-du-Roi.  Arles Train Station is 35 km away.

hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
Set by a pond, Les Rizières is a hotel situated 2.8 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2.4 km from Pont De Gau Ornithological Park with its pink flamingos. All the rooms are situated at ground-level around a patio planted with trees.

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

The seasonal outdoor, heated swimming pool is surrounded by a furnished sundeck.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

Situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 100 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries and a 2-minute walk away from the beach and the port, Hotel Le Méditérranée features a sun terrace and views of the garden. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is offered.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV. Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace.

You will find luggage storage space at the property.

Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 34 km from the property.

hotel_address: 13, Avenue de la plage, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_description:
This air-conditioned hotel featuring a terrace is located on the beachfront in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 35 km from Arles. Free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV are offered in the modern rooms.

Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have air conditioning, a terrace or a view of the sea.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Camille. You can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

Horse-riding and tennis are among the activities available in the local area. Free public parking is possible nearby and the property has a motorbike/bike garage that guests can use free of charge.

hotel_address: 15, Avenue du Docteur Cambon, 13460 Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, France
hotel_description:
Bleu Marine is just 150 metres from Mediterranean beaches and 300 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer village. It features a fenced, outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi.

Several rooms at Hotel Le Bleu Marine have a balcony with pool view. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning. Many shops and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Hot and cold drinks are available upon request.

There is a thalassotherapy centre just 100 metres from the hotel's door.

Hotel Le Bleu Marine is 40 km from Arles and 60 km from Montpellier. Free parking is available on site.

Situated 100 metres from sandy beaches and 200 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue features free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms.

A buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury options is served at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, windsurfing and cycling.

Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 53 km from the property. Public parking is available 50 metres away at no extra cost while private garage parking is available upon request for an extra charge.

hotel_name: Chez Jean - Newly renovated air-conditioned flat at the foot of the ramparts, 4 people
hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
Tour or class about local culture
Books, DVDs, or music for children
hotel_description:
Located 5 mins away from the medieval castle and 15mins from the city center, in an old street of Carcassonne, Chez Jon is a quiet, one - bedroom ground floor apartment. It features new air-con for total comfort, especially during the hot summertime The refreshing walk-in shower, separate lounge and large redesigned kitchen / dining area provide a calm atmosphere to relax after a busy day exploring the world heritage site of Carcassonne, . Free wi-fi and nearby free street parking available.

The double bedroom has a large built-in wardrobe for storage and a good sleep is assured thanks to the ‘night’ setting of the air-con unit. The lounge features a sofa-bed, TV with Netflix accessibility, air-con and free wi-fi. The new fully equipped kitchen area has a dishwasher, built-in oven\grill, coffee machine, microwave and there is a large oak dining table. The private bathroom has a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered.

A number of restaurants and shops can be found just 350 yards from the property and the city center is a 15 min walk away over the medieval bridge. For guests who wish to discover the Canal du midi, it is just a 20-minute walk from the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including golfing, cycling and hiking. Carcassonne Airport is 7 km away while Carcassonne train Station is 3 km away

Hôtel Casa Marina is situated on the beachfront in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 400 metres from Arenas Beach and less than 1 km from Crin Blanc Beach. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Amphora Beach.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have sea views. At Hôtel Casa Marina the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast.

Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km from Hôtel Casa Marina. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

hotel_name: The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge (ex inter-hôtel), Carcassonne
hotel_address: 110 rue Yves de Kerguelen (Vasco de Gama), ZI du Pont Rouge, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge, Carcassonne is located a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport and 5 km from the medieval part of town. It offers 50 rooms decorated in a modern style, all serviced by a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the rooms offer air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

Hôtel Pont Rouge is 60 km from Narbonne. Free secured parking is available on site.

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Featuring sea views, Magnificent apartment typical of Saintes-Maries-de-laMer features accommodation with a bar and a balcony, around 600 metres from Amphora Beach. The property has city views and is 600 metres from Arenas Beach and 1 km from Crin Blanc Beach. The apartment features parking on-site, beauty services and private check-in and check-out.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a satellite TV and a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, like cycling. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Magnificent apartment typical of Saintes-Maries-de-laMer.

Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from Magnificent apartment typical of Saintes-Maries-de-laMer.

hotel_name: Maison Thérèse by Panorama Locations - SPA privatif
hotel_facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
Located in Carcassonne and only 49 km from Termes Chateau, Maison Thérèse by Panorama Locations - SPA privatif provides accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. Each accommodation at the 5-star holiday home has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub and spa facilities. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The holiday home will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. At the holiday home, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

The holiday home features a barbecue and a garden.

Popular points of interest near Maison Thérèse by Panorama Locations - SPA privatif include Comtal Castle, Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) and Carcassonne Cathedral. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

hotel_name: La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
A sustainable bed and breakfast in Carcassonne and within 200 metres of Memorial House (Maison des Memoires), La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne features free bikes, comfortable soundproof rooms and free WiFi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 300 metres from Carcassonne Cathedral. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a coffee machine. Some of the units include a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. At the bed and breakfast, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available daily at the bed and breakfast.

Guests at La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Comtal Castle is 1.6 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 3 km from La Maison de L' Ambassadeur Carcassonne.

Located 500 metres from the medieval citadel of Carcassonne, Cerise Carcassonne Sud offers an indoor swimming pool, hammam, and free WiFi. The Saint Louis Bastide is only 1.5 km away.

Cerise Carcassonne Sud consists of two buildings situated in a large green space. All studios and apartments are air-conditioned and feature a TV, a wardrobe and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The kitchenette includes a microwave, kitchenware and a refrigerator. It also comes with hotplates and a coffee machine. The units offer views of the garden, medieval city or the interior courtyard.

A buffet breakfast is offered each morning at Cerise Carcassonne Sud if reserved 1 day in advance. Takeaway meals can be requested at the reception anytime of the day and enjoyed in the comfort of your room. Guests can also find grocery shops and restaurants just 200 metres from the property. The hotel also has partner restaurants nearby, where guests can have dinner or have meals delivered upon request and at an additional cost.

Additional features include luggage storage, a laundry, an elevator and free private parking on site. Carcassonne Castle is only a 10-minute walk away and Carcassonne train station is 2 km from the building.

A pre-authorization will be requested upon arrival to guarantee your stay.

Carcassonne Townhouse is set 1.1 km form the Cité Médiévale, and 800 metres from the Place Carnot and shops and restaurants. The Pont Vieux can be reached within 280 metres.

All guest rooms in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a coffee machine. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Carcassonne Townhouse, each room includes a seating area and have free WiFi. Complimentary tea and coffee making facilities can also be provided.

A continental breakfast is served every day at the property and can be enjoyed on the terrace, depending on the weather.

Carcassonne Townhouse offers a terrace.

Carcassonne Train Station is 1.2 km from the bed and breakfast. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property. Free on-street parking available next to the property.

hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Located in Carcassonne, a 20-minute walk from the medieval city walls and 100 metres from the Canal du Midi, B&B La Maison Vintage features free WiFi access and private parking.

Every room at this bed and breakfast is soundproof, air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is included in the price.

Carcassonne Town Hall is 1.1 km from B&B La Maison Vintage, while the train station is 550 metres away. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 5.6 km from the property.

hotel_address: 81 Rue De La Liberte, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_description:
Hotel De La Bastide is a family-run hotel located in the centre of Carcassonne, a 5-minute walk from the train station and a 25-minute walk from the medieval city. Free public parking is possible 50 metres away.

The hotel rooms are serviced by a lift and have air-conditioning, LCD-TV and free WiFi access.

All of the rooms and common areas in the hotel are non-smoking.

The airport shuttle stops just 150 metres from the hotel.

Hotel Astoria is located in the centre of Carcassonne, 150 metres from the train station and a 20-minute walk from the medieval city. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The guest rooms are located in two buildings, one with 2 floors and one located entirely on the ground floor. They are all equipped with a TV and telephone and each room has a private bathroom.

Astoria Hotel provides private parking and a garage, available with an extra cost and upon reservation. Parking in the garage is free for motorbikes and bicycles.

The courthouse is a 5-minute walk away and the Canal du Midi is 50 metres away.

hotel_name: Apartments Les 5 LYS - Quartier La Bastide
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Apartments La Bastide- Les 5 LYS offers self-catering accommodation located in Carcassonne. Free WiFi access is provided. The property is within walking distance from Carcassonne Medieval City and several shops and restaurants.

The apartments have a flat-screen TV and city views. There is a kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a fireplace and bed linen.

Both Perpignan - Rivesaltes Airport is and Toulouse-Blagnac Airport are under 120 km from the property, and Carcassonne Train Station is less than a 5-minute walk away. Free public parking is available nearby.

hotel_facilities: Books, DVDs, or music for children
hotel_description:
ibis Carcassonne Centre is ideally located 1 km from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 800 metres from the medieval heart of the city. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. A snack bar provides food throughout the day.

Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 500 metres from the hotel and Jean Alary Theatre, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk. Pont-Rouge Industrial Zone is 10 minutes' drive away and Carcassonne Airport is 13 minutes' drive from the hotel.

hotel_name: Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION
hotel_description:
Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Carcassonne. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an indoor pool and a concierge service.

The units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near Hotel du Roi & Spa by SOWELL COLLECTION include Memorial House (Maison des Memoires), Carcassonne Cathedral and Comtal Castle. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

hotel_address: 2 Rue Camille Saint Saens, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_description:
Hotel Montmorency is located 30 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne. It offers free WiFi access, an outdoor pool and a hot tub. A Spa with an indoor pool and hammam is also available at an extra cost.

Rooms at Hotel Montmorency are equipped with a telephone, LCD TV and private bathroom with a bath. Some rooms are air-conditioned.

Guests can relax with a drink in Montmorency’s bar and enjoy the view from its panoramic terrace. Snacking options are available.

Montmorency Hotel is 60 km from Narbonne and 70 km from Castres. Private parking is available for a supplement. Carcassonne Train Station is a 10-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale
hotel_address: 2 Rue Du Comte Roger, La Cité, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Located in the heart of the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale is surrounded by the city’s ancient ramparts. The hotel features a restaurant and bar. It is divided into 2 buildings. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

With views of street or the garden, the rooms are individually decorated and include a flat-screen TV. They overlook either the citadel or the hotel’s garden.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Le Donjon’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and there is also a cocktail bar where guests are invited to relax in the evening.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception and room service is available upon request. A dry-cleaning and laundry service is also provided at the hotel.

Le Donjon is located 2.4 km from Carcassonne Train Station. The Basilica of Saint-Nazaire is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the Château Comtal is less than 100 metres away.

Situated just 50 metres from the historic centre of Carcassone in the Aude region, Hôtel l'Aragon features free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site, and you will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Guest rooms at Aragon are equipped with air conditioning, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel l'Aragon. Guests can relax in the lounge or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Basilique Saint-Nazaire is 9 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Château Comtal is 5 minutes' walk away.

hotel_name: Mercure Carcassonne La Cité - entièrement rénové
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
Entire unit located on ground floor
hotel_description:
Set just a 4-minute walk from the medieval district of Carcassonne, Mercure Carcassonne La Cité - entièrement rénové offers an outdoor swimming pool in summer and views of the city walls. Free WiFi is provided.

Mercure Carcassonne Porte De La Cite features air-conditioned rooms with modern en suite facilities. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones and overlook the garden or the Montagne Noire.

The hotel's restaurant, Le Vicomté, serves Mediterranean specialties for lunch and dinner. A selection of wines are available to accompany your meals. Guests can also relax at the bar, next to the fireplace.

Other services include room service, free private parking, a garden and 3 meeting rooms for up to 90 people. Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

hotel_address: 15, rue de la Barbacane, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Adonis Carcassonne offers accommodation at the foot of the historic centre, just 350 metres from the medieval town of Carcassonne. It is a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport. Free WiFi access is available.

An LCD TV with satellite channels and a private safe feature in all of the apartments and studios at Adonis Carcassonne. Each is air-conditioned and also has a kitchenette with hot plates.

Guests can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Private parking is available on site and guests can also rent bicycles to visit the Cathar Castles. Saint-Nazaire Basilica is a 5-minute drive from the residence.

Housed in a historic building, SalutBB Chambre d'hote features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi in Carcassonne, 49 km from Termes Chateau. This sustainable bed and breakfast is located 400 metres from Carcassonne Cathedral and 600 metres from Memorial House (Maison des Memoires). The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The units at the bed and breakfast are fitted with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the bed and breakfast have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available each morning at the bed and breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Comtal Castle is 3.6 km from SalutBB Chambre d'hote. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

hotel_address: 2 bis Rue des Calquières, 11000 Carcassonne, France
hotel_description:
Set a 2-minute walk from the Aude river and featuring views of the Pont Vieux bridge, SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers offers accommodation with free WiFi in Carcassonne. The medieval city is just a 10-minute walk away.

Some units at the property feature a terrace with a garden view or a view of the medieval city.

A buffet breakfast is served in the morning. The restaurant offers traditional cuisine and local specialities. Guests can also enjoy a drink on the terrace, which offers views of the medieval city.

Speaking Spanish and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

Located 5 metres rfom the Carcassonne Castle, 2.4 km from Carcassonne Cathedral, GOOD KNIGHT provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace.

Around 5 km from Pont Rouge Commercial Zone, the property is also 5 km away from Perpignan IUT University - Carcassonne Campus and offers free WiFi. Local points of interest like Cavayere Lake and Grain d’Arts Media Library are reachable within 8 km and 1.8 km, respectively.

Popular points of interest near GOOD KNIGHT include Chipie International, Grain d’Sel Media Library and Tribunal d'Instance - Magistrates Court. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

Set just outside the medieval walls, this bed and breakfast is just 150 metres from the medieval city of Carcassonne and a 15-minute walk from the city centre. It offers a seasonal bar and restaurant with a terrace and views of the medieval city. Free WiFi is provided.

Rooms are simply decorated using neutral tones and all have air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Two rooms at La Rapière offer views of the medieval city and one room has a private terrace.

On the terrace or in the dining room, you can enjoy the B&B’s continental breakfast. A range of drinks are available from the bar, while the restaurant serves French and local cuisine in the form of set menus.

Free private parking is available on site and the A61 motorway is 3 km away.  The Canal du midi is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. For guests arriving by train, Carcassonne Train Station is ideally 2 km from the property.

hotel_address: Lieu-dit "Le Terrefort" Rue Serge Denis, 09000 Foix, France
hotel_description:
Set on a 4300 m² garden, this 3-star hotel is 2 km from Foix Train Station. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with chairs and free Wi-Fi access in the entire property.

hotel_description:
Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator is a luxury hotel located in the city of Nimes. Bordering the Jardin de la Fontaine, L'Imperator is less than five minutes’ walk from the Maison Carrée Roman temple and the Carrée d'Art museum. Past guests of this historic hotel include Ava Gardner, Ernest Hemingway, and Torero El Cordobes.

Rooms are in a Mediterranean style with natural stone, marble and wood. Equipped with a walk-in shower, each room also has a Smart TV with ChromeCast so you can view and share your personal content. Some rooms overlook the hotel gardens.

L'Imperator boasts a 24/7 reception desk, and has baby equipment and services for children. The Spa by CODAGE offers an indoor and outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi, a sensory shower and a hammam, as well as a full range of massages.

L’Imperator is the home of Pierre Gagnaire, an award-winning chef elected best chef in the world by his peers, and the two onsite restaurants offer guests 2 different gastronomic experiences. The Duende gourmet restaurant is the place to experience extraordinary flavours. L'Impé brasserie, situated on the Imperator’s inner patio in the shade of a Gingko Biloba tree, serves a generous and refined cuisine highlighting local produce.

The Hemingway Bar offers cocktails in a relaxed setting. A continental breakfast is served daily, or you can enjoy breakfast in your room.

A private, on-site car park is available upon reservation. Nimes TGV Train Station is less than 2 km from L'Imperator.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are non-smoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.
